name: Cursed Kingdom
description:
A terrible Great Plague has struck your kingdom!
Try to save as many of your subjects as possible by blocking infected settlements and sending experienced healers to help.

===============================================

It's the twelfth and lastgame in my 2021:GameAMonth project. The theme for the month was "MANIFESTO".

The theme of my manifesto was: "Games can tell stories through mechanics".

I tried to create a small game that would generate a large number of different stories of saving the kingdom from the plague. With a little help from your imagination, of course.
